column4: hey people, i have a asus eee 1000he, supposed to run 9,5h, but i only get like 5,5h with ubuntu. i have the CPU freqed down, screen birghtness low, not using sound, no wireless, but it just aint working
btw guys im in a hospital right now, connected to cables and stuff - not even kidding
